reviewText:
I got trolled by the fake positive review, that has just disapeared from the review page.
Lets see: 1. Just played the game and there was not even one single server online.
2. The bots (maximum 8) are stupid, they just stand there and shoot.
3. Only 2 maps.
4. Super speed and normal speed difference is massive. When you don't hold shift its sooooo slow, like youre walking,
so you just end up holding shift anyway.
5. guns (only 2) feel like potatoes.
6. Blur is always on.

This game" feels like someone modded a crappy bargain bin fps by stripping it of everything
recommended: then got the license to sell it as a standalone."

reviewText: Not a good game. has a very good concept but the gameplay is just awful.
